Name: Feral Flowers
About the game: Feral Flowers is a quick-fire roguelite platformer for hay fever haters. Traverse 92 overly-pollinated levels as Quigley the Gardener. Stomp on every flower you see. Battle against the clock to rid your nostrils of that which makes you sneeze.
